original_text:
“Man is also rebuked with pain on his bed
    and with continual strife in his bones,
korean_text: 혹은 사람이 병상의 고통과 뼈가 늘 쑤심의 징계를 받나니

sentences.original_text: Man is also rebuked with pain on his bed
sentences.korean_translation: 사람은 또한 침상에�� 고통으로 징계를 받고

sentences.original_text: with continual strife in his bones
